artist: Artist: The Institute of Fatuous Research, London; Publisher: Play Time For Ever Press, London
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and a blurry image of a tower, that appears to have been lifted from an engraving, in pink; 32 pp.

title: Fatuoustimes, issue 4: Special Fatuous Noise and Politics Issue
